imdb.plot outline: Explore the Earth's greatest treasures (including diamonds, gold, pearls, gems, coal and precious minerals) and discover how they have influenced the path of history and caused empires to rise and fall. This mini-series investigates the scientific, technological and cultural significance of the world's most rare and valuable natural treasures.
imdb.title: Nature's Treasures
plot: Explore the Earth's greatest treasures (including diamonds, gold, pearls, gems, coal and precious minerals) and discover how they have influenced the path of history and caused empires to rise and fall.
